text: The 2017 Girls' Youth European Volleyball Championship was the 12th edition of the tournament which was held in Arnhem, Netherlands from 1 to 9 April 2017. The top six teams qualified for the 2017 Youth World Championship. ==Participating teams== {| class="wikitable" !Team !Method of qualification |- | || Qualification pool B winner |- | || Qualification
